snippet: A dispute between Mayor Bloomberg and Governors Cuomo and Christie has the completion of the memorial behind schedule. These three men should be able resolve their quarrel quickly.
abstract: Editorial calls on New York Mayor Michael Bloomberg, Gov Andrew Cuomo and New Jersey Gov Chris Christie to resolve their cost disputes and finish the Sept 11 museum, which had been set for completion in September 2012.
lead_paragraph: A dispute between Mayor Bloomberg and Governors Cuomo and Christie has the completion of the memorial behind schedule. These three men should be able resolve their quarrel quickly.

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
